name: Skullbloom
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The skullbloom makes one Bite attack and one Slam attack. If the Bite and Slam attacks both hit one Humanoid, the target must succeed on a DC 12 CON save or be infected with apocalyptic fungus (see sidebar).

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 3 (1d4+1) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) poison damage.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 3 (1d4+1) bludgeoning damage.

bonus_actions.name: Instinct to Pursue
bonus_actions.desc: The skullboom takes the Dash action toward an uninfected Humanoid it can see or sense.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Hearing
special_abilities.desc: The skullbloom's Perception is 16 while perceiving by hearing.

special_abilities.name: Plant Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The skullbloom is resistant to exhaustion and to the paralyzed, petrified, and unconscious conditions.
